MARIO LIVERNI           LA BIBLE ET LÃ‚Â´INVENTION DE LÃ‚Â´HISTOIRE











Mario Liverani (University of Rome) is one of the best european historicians of the

 Bronze-Iron age of the east mediterranean .



250 years ago this field of study was called "Sacred History" but today the methods 

of investigation have changed for the good , and now the conclusions come as result 

and not at the beginning .



The book is a narrative socio-political description of the 1000 years of history from

King David to the roman times
